body:
Holy guacamole!! it's been forever!! Does anyone even remember me anymore? Probably not ;;m;;
anyway i'm Totodile_Love, or now know as gaiaxles!!! (But you can call me bat/mama/mom!!) Since i last left off, i was just becoming an artist! Ugh my stuff was grooooossss! But hey, everyone starts out bad!

Anyway if you'd like to find me i'll be on the server or here! :
http://gaiaxles.deviantart.com/
http://gaiaxles.tumblr.com/

!!!!!!
